en.name: Fail Token Campaign
en.description: The official WeiFund bug bounty program fail campaign. Find bugs, earn rewards!
en.disambiguatedDescription: An official WeiFund bug bounty program campaign. Find bugs, earn rewards!
en.about: The WeiFund bug bounty program provides rewards for discovering bugs in our code base. In addition to ether rewards, you can also be recognized on our website and on Github. See our Github (https://github.com/weifund/weifund-contracts/blob/master/BUG-BOUNTY-DETAILS.md) page for more details. To learn more about WeiFund, please see our ReadTheDocs (https://weifund.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).  The **Fail Token **campaign has a funding goal of 10,000 ether and funding cap of 100,000 ether. The campaign will fail to raise the required funds and will refund all of its contributors.

en.name: Success Token Campaign
en.description: The official WeiFund bug bounty program success campaign. Find bugs, earn rewards!
en.disambiguatedDescription: An official WeiFund bug bounty program campaign. Find bugs, earn rewards!
en.about: WeiFund Bug Bounty Program provides rewards for discovering bugs in our code base. In addition to ether rewards, you can also be recognized on our website and on Github. See our Github (https://github.com/weifund/weifund-contracts/blob/master/BUG-BOUNTY-DETAILS.md) page for more details. To learn more about WeiFund, please see our ReadTheDocs (https://weifund.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).  The **Success Token **campaign has a funding goal of 150 ether with a funding cap of 5,000 ether. The campaign will be successful, and the tokens will be frozen for a limited time before being unfrozen and distributed. The ether funds in the Success Token campaign contract will be sent to a multisig beneficiary.
